name: Remains of the Day (makeout creek)
description:
This is a short little interactive narrative made in Twine (my first ever!). It was created for  Tower Jam all the way back in 2013. Remains of the Day is based on the Dragon Age 2 quest "All That Remains". Similar to the quest, it's impossible to rescue Leandra from her fate, but I wrote it to give her a little more agency than sitting around waiting for death or rescue. 

Note: Remains was created in an older version of Twine 1, and despite my best efforts, I was unable to successfully convert it to a format editable in Twine 2, so the formatting can be a little funky during play. If a link brings you to a screen that appears blank, please scroll down to find the text!
